game.name: Trackmania
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, LAN PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: 클럽에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 지금 운전대를 잡고 트랙매니아를 무료로 플레이해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Club! Grab the wheel and play Trackmania® for FREE now.

reviewHighlights.text: Runs well on my handheld (legion go s z2go), but I don't care for subscriptions. I'd rather just pay one or play the other trackmania games.
great game to cure boredom is annoying how it is a subscription based game and there isnt an option to just buy the game forever
